subject: Test_App_Email_1234 gmail
body:
Dear Sir,



This is to inform you that I while I was practicing golf in my backyard, an errant shot broke my neighbour’s window. He has asked me to replace his window and I would like to claim this expense against my home insurance policy.

Please find attached my policy claim form duly filled.



Best regards,



Astrix Gallier
Tel: +43 (151) 017565893214
